result.reason: Valid security enhancement to support TOTP/OTP authentication (e.g. TOTP codes for SSH/RDP jump hosts) that would improve 2FA workflows in connection management.
result.approach: Add optional OTP/TOTP field to ConnectionInfo, integrate a TOTP library (e.g. Otp.NET) to generate codes on demand, and expose a UI button or token macro (e.g. %OTP%) for use in external tools and connection pre-scripts
